creator: UZURV
descriptionHtml:
Use the UZURV Ride app to schedule, track, and manage your trips easily.

The app is simple to use and puts reliable, affordable, and safe transportation back in your hands.

You’ll also have direct access to rider support and your credentialed driver through the app.

ON-TIME AND ACCESSIBLE
With the UZURV WCAG 2.1 AA Certified accessible Ride app, you can schedule and manage trips to fit your needs all in one place. Plus every trip is closely monitored with live support and oversight by the UZURV operations team. Track your ride as they approach your pick-up & drop-off location in real time.

CONVENIENT AND FLEXIBLE SCHEDULING
Schedule rides weeks in advance or on-demand. Set favorite locations. Book round trips. Change your travel plans or update reservations as needed.

SEE THE PRICE BEFORE YOU RIDE
Manage trips, pick-up & drop-off locations, and your scheduled reservations to see the price of rides before you take them.

SAFE DOOR-TO-DOOR SERVICE
UZURV drivers are all extensively certified including ADA compliance, FTA Drug and Alcohol tested, CPR & First-Aid, defensive driving, and door-to-door service. Every trip is monitored in real time for the safety of riders and drivers.

CONTACT SUPPORT AND HELP
Call, text, or email the UZURV support team immediately during hours of service thanks to the support button on every screen of the app.

FROM UZURV INC
UZURV is an Adaptive Transportation Network providing a technology platform that puts drivers’ and riders’ safety and independence first. To learn more about UZURV visit https://uzurv.com

Follow us on Twitter.
Like us on Facebook and Instagram.
Learn more about us on UZURV.com.

Have a question? Email us at support@uzurv.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We've updated the ride creation process to verify that all rides are within program service areas. And of course we've fixed some bugs.

title: UZURV Ride

creator: UZURV
descriptionHtml:
This app is for Riders who want to schedule, track, and manage trips easily.
Drivers looking to drive for UZURV, search for UZURV360 in your app store to download the driver app.

The app is simple to use and puts reliable, affordable, and safe transportation back in your hands.

You’ll also have direct access to rider support and your credentialed driver through the app.

ON-TIME AND ACCESSIBLE
With the UZURV WCAG 2.1 AA Certified accessible Ride app, you can schedule and manage trips to fit your needs all in one place. Plus every trip is closely monitored with live support and oversight by the UZURV operations team. Track your ride as they approach your pick-up & drop-off location in real time.

CONVENIENT AND FLEXIBLE SCHEDULING
Schedule rides weeks in advance or on-demand. Set favorite locations. Book round trips. Change your travel plans or update reservations as needed.

SEE THE PRICE BEFORE YOU RIDE
Manage trips, pick-up & drop-off locations, and your scheduled reservations to see the price of rides before you take them.

SAFE DOOR-TO-DOOR SERVICE
UZURV drivers are all extensively certified including ADA compliance, FTA Drug and Alcohol tested, CPR & First-Aid, defensive driving, and door-to-door service. Every trip is monitored in real time for the safety of riders and drivers.

CONTACT SUPPORT AND HELP
Call, text, or email the UZURV support team immediately during hours of service thanks to the support button on every screen of the app.

FROM UZURV INC
UZURV is an Adaptive Transportation Network providing a technology platform that puts drivers’ and riders’ safety and independence first. To learn more about UZURV visit https://uzurv.com

Follow us on Twitter.
Like us on Facebook and Instagram.
Learn more about us on UZURV.com.

Have a question? Email us at support@uzurv.com

title: UZURV Ride

creator: UZURV
descriptionHtml:
UZURV Ride is a fully ADA-accessible app that allows riders to easily schedule, track, and manage rides all in one place.

Whether you’re going to an appointment, need a ride to the store, or visiting friends, UZURV Ride makes it simple to get reliable, affordable, and ADA-accessible transportation from the convenience of your phone. Book rides instantly, track scheduled and on-demand rides in real time, and reach live Rider Support with the push of a button.

Download the app to enjoy more choice and better control over your day-to-day schedule with UZURV Ride.

PLEASE NOTE:

For eligibility requirements to ride with UZURV, contact your local transit service provider.
For people looking to DRIVE with UZURV, search for and download the UZURV Drive app to get started.

Here’s what you’ll get with UZURV Ride:

ADA-ACCESSIBLE
Conveniently schedule and manage your rides using a fully accessible (WCAG 2.1) compliant app.

ON TIME AND RELIABLE
Know when your Driver will arrive and when you will reach your destination with real time ride tracking.

CONVENIENT AND FLEXIBLE SCHEDULING
UZURV Ride allows you to schedule rides same-day or weeks in advance. Book round trips. Set your favorite pick-up and drop-off locations. Change your travel plans and update reservations. Plus, see price estimates before you schedule your ride.

SAFE DOOR-TO-DOOR SERVICE
UZURV takes safety and compliance seriously. All UZURV Drivers are FTA Drug and Alcohol tested and certified in CPR & First-Aid. They are also prepared to provide service that is door-to-door and ADA compliant.

RIDER SUPPORT AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
Every ride is closely monitored by our live Rider Support team to ensure your ride is safe and on time. Call, text, or email Rider Support from anywhere in the app.


FROM UZURV INC.
UZURV is an Adaptive Transportation Network providing a technology platform that puts Drivers’ and Riders’ safety and independence first. To learn more about UZURV visit https://uzurv.com

Follow us on Twitter.
Like us on Facebook and Instagram.
Learn more about us on UZURV.com.

Have a question? Email us at ridersupport@uzurv.com or call 866-898-7836.
